title: Print, "Design for a Coach", ca. 1760
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: J.F. Chopard Inv.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper center: Vis a vis; upper right: 1; lower center: Echelle de 5 Pied [with scale] / à Paris chez N. J. B. de Poilly rue S. Jacques à L'Esperance
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Carriage decorated in Rococo motif. Left, wheel with words: Jante; Lisoire; Fouchette. Right, words: Lisoire; Mouton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for a Coach", ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. Engraving on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-272-1.
